title: Proposal Writing and Submission Guide
creator: GDG IIIT Kalyani
desc:
This video is a comprehensive guide to proposal writing for Winter of Code 5.0, designed to help contributors understand how to write a clear, well-structured and impactful proposal.

‚ú® In this guide, you'll learn:
‚Ä¢ How to structure a strong project proposal
‚Ä¢ What mentors look for during evaluation
‚Ä¢ How to present ideas with clarity and intent
‚Ä¢ Common mistakes to avoid
‚Ä¢ Best practices to improve your chances

This guide is especially helpful for first-time open-source contributors and anyone aiming to submit a thoughtful, well-crafted proposal.

Winter of Code 5.0 is all about learning, collaboration, and real-world open-source experience.üöÄ
Have questions? Reach out to us on Discord or in the official discussion channels.

Stay tuned for more sessions and updates from Winter of Code 5.0.

title: Inaugral Ceremony
creator: GDG IIIT Kalyani
desc:
Welcome to the official Inaugural Ceremony of Winter of Code 5.0! üéâ

The moment we've all been waiting for is finally here. As we officially kick off Winter of Code 5.0 today, marking the beginning of an exciting and impactful open-source journey hosted by GDG On Campus IIIT Kalyani.‚ùÑÔ∏è
In this ceremony, we'll introduce the vision, structure and roadmap of the program, walk through the timeline and contribution process and give you a glimpse of the organizations, projects and mentorship ahead.

Kicking things off with an outstanding lineup of speakers - renowned industry leaders and open-source advocates who are shaping the ecosystem:
‚Ä¢ Chris Sells 
‚Ä¢ Vanshika Agarwal
‚Ä¢ Santosh Yadav
‚Ä¢ Praveen Kumar

Let's set the stage for an unforgettable Winter of Code journey.

title: Complete Registration Guide
creator: GDG IIIT Kalyani
desc:
Kickstart your journey with Winter of Code 5.0 ! üöÄ
This tutorial covers everything you need to know about the new candidate registration process, ensuring you understand each step and can join the program without any hassle.

‚ùÑÔ∏è About Winter of Code 5.0
Winter of Code 5.0 is a GSoC-inspired Open-Source program where students contribute to real projects, work closely with mentors and build a strong developer portfolio through hands-on experience.
